meanings.definition: A family of freshwater fish known for their small size and colorful appearance.

meanings.sent2: The pet store had a variety of characids for sale.
meanings.sent3: The characids decided to have a fashion show to show off their colorful scales.

meanings.sent5: The children were mesmerized by the vibrant hues of the characids.
